name: Hell Freezes Over
description:
"Hell" is waiting for its newest demon.  Well not actually Hell (see the quotes). You've been summoned to the most out of place for someone like you, the North Pole.

Controls:

  • Right Arrow = Right
  • Left Arrow = Left
  • Space = Jump
  • Q = Transform

Engine:

  • ClickTeam Fusion 2.5

Free Assets Used:

  • Character Art: 0x72
  • Background Art: Kenney
  • Sound Effects: ChipTone
  • Background Music: Fesliyan Studios

Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
